title: 怎么让服务器不生成地狱
author: Zengdadawang
txt_content: 各位大佬们，我想让玩家不能进地狱，怎么弄

replies.author: TheIzumiSagirl
replies.txt_content:
Zengdadawang 发表于 2020-4-29 19:49
没用，试过了
换一个核心试试

replies.author: TheIzumiSagirl
replies.txt_content:
在sever.propertites文件里有个
allow nether = true
把true改成false

replies.author: Zengdadawang
replies.txt_content:
结城希亚 发表于 2020-4-29 19:47
server.properties里把allow-nether那一项改为false
没用试过了

replies.author: Zengdadawang
replies.txt_content:
qq1041432233 发表于 2020-4-29 19:47
在sever.propertites文件里有个
allow nether = true
把true改成false
没用，试过了

replies.author: Xu_Yang
replies.txt_content:
Essentials的配置文件夹中 config里面 
protect: portal-creation: true 
# 阻止传送门的创造

replies.author: Ling_Haner
replies.txt_content: 在服务端目录下将sever.propertites文件中的allow_nether设置为false，并将目录下的world_nether文件夹删除

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
[管理] BanWorld v0.2 —— 禁止玩家进入某个世界[全版本]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-279593-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

禁止那个世界就行

replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content:
上面说的没问题，设置完了再删掉现有地狱就行
还能进的话就太少见了，多世界里maxplayer设成-1就好了hhh

replies.author: VivTav
replies.txt_content: 用插件禁用  应该有这种插件  或者自己写一个
